short_summary: procure items as detailed in the notice of proposed procurement (NPP)
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT. DND requires two thermal relays model LR9F5369, Parts nr: 14-503-2308, Quantity 40 pieces, to be delivered to two naval bases. Suppliers are required to indicate the brand name and model, part number and NCAGE of the product proposed.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: RELAY, THERMAL
=====================================

## Notice
---------------

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of RELAY, THERMAL, as outlined below.

## Delivery Location
-------------------

Deliveries are to be made to the following locations:

* Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt
* Canadian Forces Base Halifax

## Requirements
-------------

The procurement consists of the following items:

* RELAY, THERMAL, Gaining Share in Need (GSIN) 5945, National Stock Number (NSN) 14-503-2308
	+ Part Number: LR9F5369
	+ Quantity: 20 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt
* RELAY, THERMAL, GSIN 5945, NSN 14-503-2308
	+ Part Number: LR9F5369
	+ Quantity: 20 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base Halifax

## Bidding Requirements
-----------------------

Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in a foreign currency will be rejected. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Language
------------

Documentation may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information
---------------------

For further information, please contact:

* Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3674

## Notice URL
--------------

[ Canadian Procurement and Public Services ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/3c25c949fcc151e523e85e4521cd42b8/rfp_w8482-231001-a-en.pdf) \(English\)

[ Canadian Procurement and Public Services ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/4d2624820db6d411c520a6e44eee3fe6/rfp_w8482-231001-a-fr.pdf) \(French\)

## Document
-------------

The complete proposal document can be found above under the Notice URL.
